EmailTemplate.name: Email Project.Warranty Inquiry Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Warranty Inquiry Confirmation {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Warranty Inquiry Confirmation
We’re glad to hear from you!
Thanks for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. We’ve already started working on your {!Case.Subject} inquiry. Here’s your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can use this number to track our progress.
Questions
We’ll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, if you need to reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
While we work on your specific request, here are a few helpful tips and answers to the most commonly asked questions:
1 What’s the typical turnaround time for Honeywell to process a warranty claim? - About 30 days.
2 How do I request a warranty repair? - Return the unit to the nearest Honeywell repair facility. Write or Type “Warranty Requested”, on the repair paperwork — ensuring that the request is prominent.
3 Where do I send my part for repair? - Click here to find where to send your parts.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
